author: Sonji Milburn
title: Midland Chef Michael Olivas feeds heroes amid Texas flood recovery | newswest9.com
text:
MIDLAND, Texas — As flash flooding continues to devastate parts of Central Texas, a local Midland chef is stepping up to provide relief in the best way he knows how through food.
Michael Olivas, owner and chef of Exquisite Catering in Midland, has partnered with the Full Moon Inn Bed and Breakfast in Fredericksburg, Texas, to feed first responders and volunteers assisting with disaster recovery efforts.
The idea began when the inn’s owner, a longtime friend of Olivas, posted a plea for help on Facebook. That message inspired him to take immediate action.
"I saw her post and it struck me," Olivas said. "I wanted to help her and ease the stress of cooking, so I decided to go and bring my staff."
Since arriving in Fredericksburg, Olivas has committed to preparing breakfast and dinner for more than 120 people each day. The meals are being offered not only to those staying at the inn but to anyone in the area who needs them.
"My calling is to feed people," he said. "And when I can do that, especially in this kind of situation. It's really meaningful to me."
Olivas said he spent $3,000 of his own money on groceries and raised another $4,000 through community support in Midland. He and his team plan to remain in Fredericksburg for six days.
As cleanup and search efforts continue in the wake of widespread flooding, Olivas hopes his meals bring a small measure of comfort to those working tirelessly on the front lines.
Close Ad

author: Reuters
title: Ukraine begins rebuilding cities despite war to bring back citizens and rebuild their future - The Hindu
text:
An excavator belches out fumes as it clears earth and rubble from between the train and bus stations in the Ukrainian town of Trostianets to make way for a reimagined transport hub.An excavator belches out fumes as it clears earth and rubble from between the train and bus stations in the Ukrainian town of Trostianets to make way for a reimagined transport hub.
Badly damaged in fighting with Russian forces almost two years ago, Trostianets is one of six settlements being rebuilt with state funds in a pilot programme to develop the skills and experience needed for a far broader reconstruction drive later.
Mayor Yuriy Bova said time was running out to breathe life back into towns, or risk losing millions of Ukrainians who could help redevelop the country to permanent exile in Europe.
“We’re fighting for every person who should return; for every child who needs to return and build their future here,” he said in the town, barely 30 km from Russia.
“To walk around and see this every day, that will morally traumatise a person,” Mr. Bova said of the ruined northeastern town. “We need to restore everything, starting with cafes, libraries, factories, schools, hospitals.”
Officials in Kyiv have also signalled the urgence of rebuilding Ukraine, an effort that will require hundreds of billions of dollars and involve more than quick fixes to critical sites such as hospitals, power stations and railways.
The war, however, shows no signs of abating. Short on cash, Ukraine is defending against new Russian attacks after its own counteroffensive failed to yield significant gains. Moscow has also resumed a campaign of mass air strikes on population centres far beyond the front line.
‘Unaffordable luxury’ For Pavlo Kuzmenko, the Mayor of Okhtyrka, a town only 20 km down the road from Trostianets that also bears the scars of heavy Russian bombing at the start of the war, resurrecting town squares is a luxury Ukraine cannot afford right now.
Officials in Okhtyrka were slow to finish clearing away the rubble on the main boulevard that was once the city hall and have not yet fixed the gutted department store across the street. Most schools, however, have been repaired with new windows, roofing or bomb shelters, thanks in large part to international donors.
Mr. Kuzmenko, who publicly criticised the plans for Trostianets last year and bemoaned a lack of resources, said the focus should be on patching up homes and critical infrastructure only. Any other available funds should go to the military.
“There is plenty to rebuild,” Kuzmenko said. “Squares, and all their decorations, can be done after the war.”
Standing near the remains of the city hall, Okhtyrka resident Antonina Dmytrychenko said she agreed with her mayor: “First we need victory, then reconstruction.”
The different views in the neighbouring towns reflect a broader debate about wartime spending playing out across Ukraine. Most visibly, a growing grassroots protest movement is demanding that discretionary projects, such as sprucing up streets and public spaces, be shelved in favour of the military.
In a sign of the tension, officials in the Odesa region cancelled more than $9 million of tenders during the last three months of 2023, saying spending on things such as road repairs, the renovation of a stadium and software was “unacceptable” during wartime.
The disputes highlight the need for a clearly communicated government strategy for what recovery and, more broadly, a war-adapted economy should look like, said Orysia Lutsevych at the Chatham House think-tank in London.
She said officials must urgently unlock Ukraine’s economic potential by restoring income-generating growth opportunities that can help defeat Russia — and that meant luring people back as well as stopping more leaving the country for good.
‘Same equation’ “Militaries win battles, but economies win wars. It’s part of the same equation,” she said.
It might make sense, for example, to build more schools in the comparably safer western city of Lviv for the many Ukrainians displaced there by fighting elsewhere, so they will stay and contribute to the wartime economy, Ms. Lutsevych said.
“This is what rebuilding is: maybe it’s not fancy playgrounds, maybe it’s not new zoos,” she said. “But it must be a category of projects that fits within the wider strategy of how Ukraine will sustain this war.”
So far, more than $1.6 billion has been earmarked from the fund for reconstruction, Prime Minister Shmyhal said in October.
The pilot projects received about $86 million last year, though the 2024 budget has not yet been set, a spokesperson for the reconstruction agency said.
Overall, the World Bank has estimated that rebuilding Ukraine will cost more than $400 billion over the next decade, and Western lenders have signalled they are prepared to provide the bulk of the financing.
COMMents

Copy link Facebook Twitter Telegram LinkedIn WhatsApp Reddit

author: world today news
title: Ian Aerts (17) Excels in Fast Food Training Program at KFC - World Today News
text:
Ian Aerts (17) lives on the Left Bank and can therefore easily cycle to the KFC fast food restaurant in the shadow of the cathedral. There he learns the tricks of the fast food trade. “I didn’t really know what I wanted to do, but I did have a great interest in kitchen work.”
Ian is following the Fast Food Employee training course in special education, the Learning Expert in Schoolstraat. This course uses ‘dual learning’ where students spend three days in the work field and two days at school. Ian: “At school we learn about hygiene rules and first aid, but we also receive regular subjects such as physical education and religion.”
The training also covers all departments of a fast food restaurant. Ian also works at the cash registers in the front station, prepares the burgers in the mid-station and learns to prepare everything fresh in the back station.
“The work in the kitchen cannot be underestimated,” emphasizes Joren Jonckers (30), the HR manager. “I was there for a week myself because I wanted to know how it all works. The chickens arrive here fresh and are breaded, marinated and fried in our kitchen.”
In addition, there are also strict rules for the shelf life of the products. “For example, on a screen in the kitchen you can see how long the chicken wings have been ready. They must be thrown away after 45 minutes. So you have to keep a close eye on when something is running low or needs to be remade,” Ian explains neatly.
Joren Jonckers (right) is the HR manager at KFC and is a big supporter of dual learning. — © Margot De Clercq
Six students are currently following the training at Leerexpert. “The school feels the growth potential of this course, because it is not yet well known,” says Sofie De Keyser, spokesperson for Municipal Education.
Because the students are really in the professional field, they have had to discover a lot independently. Ian: “I learned a lot from all the managers here. They are always ready with tips and I could always ask questions if something was unclear.”
Manager When Ian graduates in June, he will enjoy his well-deserved summer vacation. But after that he can count on a permanent contract in this KFC branch. Joren Jonckers from KFC: “It is very nice that such an option as dual learning is available. It also fulfills a social importance for us and it is an ideal way of recruitment. Ian learned the rules with us, so he knows exactly how we work.”
Now Ian always worked from 10 a.m. to 5 or 6 p.m., but with a permanent contract he will of course also have to work at night. “I have no problem with that, I’m quite a night owl. I am looking forward to it and also have the ambition to grow as a manager.”
According to Joren, that is also no problem. “We really like this way of working because we have been able to contribute to many success stories. Schools now know that we are open to collaborations and are increasingly contacting us.”
Ian has manned every station in the branch, from cash register to kitchen. — © Margot De Clercq
2024-04-11 16:31:00
#studying #Fast #Food #Employee #immediately #signed #contract #KFC #students #working #field

author: Folha Vitória
title: Mais de 50 cidades do ES recebem novo alerta de chuvas intensas; veja lista
text: Mais de 50 cidades do ES recebem novo alerta de chuvas intensas; veja lista Segundo o alerta, há possibilidade de chuva entre 20 e 30 mm/h ou até 50 mm/dia, além de ventos intensos de até 60 km/h O Instituto Nacional de Metereologia (Inmet) emitiu, nesta sexta-feira (1º), um novo alerta de chuvas intensas válido para as regiões Centro e Norte do Espírito Santo. São 56 cidades com o alerta vigente. O aviso de perigo potencial para chuvas intensas, indicado por meio da cor amarela, é válido até as 10h deste sábado (02). Leia também: [> Vai chover no Dia de Finados? Veja a previsão do tempo para o ES](https://www.folhavitoria.com.br/geral/noticia/11/2024/vai-chover-no-dia-de-finados-veja-a-previsao-do-tempo-para-o-es) [> Hóspede ilustre: bicho-preguiça "invade" pousada em Linhares](https://www.folhavitoria.com.br/geral/noticia/11/2024/hospede-ilustre-bicho-preguica-invade-pousada-em-linhares) [> Universitária perde pasta e pede ajuda: "Não posso me formar"](https://www.folhavitoria.com.br/geral/noticia/10/2024/universitaria-perde-pasta-no-transcol-e-pede-ajuda-estou-entrando-em-surto) Segundo o alerta, há possibilidade de chuva entre 20 e 30 mm/h ou até 50 mm/dia. Além de ventos intensos de 40 até 60 km/h. O instituto informa que é baixo o risco de corte de energia elétrica, queda de galhos de árvores, alagamentos e de descargas elétricas. Confira instruções dadas pelo Inmet: - Em caso de rajadas de vento: (não se abrigue debaixo de árvores, pois há leve risco de queda e descargas elétricas e não estacione veículos próximos a torres de transmissão e placas de propaganda). - Evite usar aparelhos eletrônicos ligados à tomada. - Obtenha mais informações junto à Defesa Civil (telefone 199) e ao Corpo de Bombeiros (telefone 193). Veja as cidades com o alerta amarelo vigente: 1- Afonso Cláudio 2- Água Doce do Norte 3- Águia Branca 4- Alto Rio Novo 5- Aracruz 6- Baixo Guandu 7- Barra de São Francisco 8- Boa Esperança 9- Brejetuba 10- Cariacica 11- Colatina 12- Conceição da Barra 13- Conceição do Castelo 14- Domingos Martins 15- Ecoporanga 16- Fernandes Tourinho 17- Fronteira dos Vales 18- Fundão 19- Governador Lindenberg 20- Ibatiba 21- Ibiraçu 22- Irupi 23- Itaguaçu 24- Itarana 25- Iúna 26- Jaguaré 27- João Neiva 28- Laranja da Terra 29- Linhares 30- Mantenópolis 31- Marechal Floriano 32- Marilândia 33- Montanha 34- Mucurici 35- Muniz Freire 36- Nova Venécia 37- Pancas 38- Pedro Canário 39- Pinheiros 40- Ponto Belo 41- Rio Bananal 42- Santa Leopoldina 43- Santa Maria de Jetibá 44- Santa Teresa 45- São Domingos do Norte 46- São Gabriel da Palha 47- São Mateus 48- São Roque do Canaã 49- Serra 50- Sooretama 51- Venda Nova do Imigrante 52- Viana 53 - Vila Pavão 54- Vila Valério 55- Vila Velha 56- Vitória

author: Diario Bitcoin
title: HarryPotterObamaPacMan8Inu (XRP) sube un 144% mientras NuggetRush (NUGX) recauda USD $1,5 millones en su preventa Por Diario Bitcoin
text:
HarryPotterObamaPacMan8Inu (XRP) sube un 144% mientras NuggetRush (NUGX) recauda USD $1,5 millones en su preventa XRP/USD -3.18% Agregar/Eliminar del portafolio Añadir a mi lista de seguimiento Añadir posición Posición añadida con éxito a:
Introduzca un nombre para su portafolio de posiciones Tipo: Compra Venta Fecha: Cantidad: Precio Valor del punto: Apalancamiento: 1:1 1:10 1:25 1:50 1:100 1:200 1:400 1:500 1:1000 Comisión: Crear una nueva lista de seguimiento Crear Crear nuevo portafolio de posiciones Añadir Crear + Añadir otra posición Cerrar El equipo de NuggetRush analiza el sorpresivo incremento visto en el precio del token HarryPotterObamaPacMan8Inu, y aprovecha el espacio para ofrecer más información sobre su preventa en curso.
***
Las nuevas monedas meme son famosas por contar inicialmente con un gran apoyo de los inversores, lo que a menudo conduce a un incremento notable en su cotización. Muchos se ven especialmente atraídos por las oportunidades que plantea este sector, y un ejemplo de ello es la shitcoin HarryPotterObamaPacMan8Inu ( XRP ), la cual ha registrado un incremento de más del 144% en los últimos días.
Contrario a esto destaca el caso de NuggetRush (NUGX) , una nueva memecoin en fase de preventa que ha venido recaudando capital en estos últimos meses. Las expectativas por el lanzamiento de su plataforma se han visto reflejadas en la demanda del token NUGX, el cual ya ha recaudado USD $1,5 millones por parte de inversionistas interesados.
Exploremos el aumento de HarryPotterObamaPacMan8Inu mientras analizamos la tracción de la preventa de NuggetRush.
NuggetRush (NUGX) en preventa: Buena opción para el sector DeFi NuggetRush es una plataforma de juegos en la que los usuarios pueden ganar enormes cantidades de dinero extrayendo minerales preciosos e intercambiándolos para obtener ganancias reales.
NuggetRush lleva su modelo DeFi más allá al incluir funciones Web3. Los usuarios de la plataforma pueden ganar dinero con sus personajes de juego porque también son NFT valiosos que pueden intercambiarse por dinero.
La rara colección RUSHGEMS contienen NFTs muy destacables, porque los usuarios que tengan la suerte de encontrar estos coleccionales pueden recibir oro real si deciden intercambiarlos.
Estas propiedades muestran que NuggetRush es una gran oportunidad de inversión en criptomonedas repleta de características modernas que podrían seguir generando ganancias a largo plazo. Para asegurar ingresos pasivos para los usuarios de la plataforma, el proyecto permite a los titulares de NFT poner en garantía sus activos a cambio de un porcentajes de rendimiento.
Todas las características que ofrece NuggetRush han derivado en un respaldo palpable por parte de los inversores, quienes principalmente son comerciantes, jugadores y entusiastas que han participado en la preventa del token NUGX.
Al momento de edición, se han vendido más de 1,3 millones de tokens NUGX, con lo cual se ha recaudado más de USD $1,5 millones. Estas cifras dan cuenta del potencial de la plataforma, y durante la preventa se está comercializando la moneda digital a unos USD $0,015 por unidad.
HarryPotterObamaPacMan8Inu (XRP): Aumento en el marco del mercado alcista HarryPotterObamaPacMan8Inu es una moneda meme de rápido crecimiento que sorprendentemente opera en la red Blockchain de Ethereum . Entrelaza varios personajes famosos para crear una criptomoneda interactiva.
La moneda meme afirma que su punto de venta único es su utilidad, de la mano con recompensas innovadoras. El sitio web también respalda una causa noble, porque busca recaudar fondos para hacer donativos a ONGs que trabajan en el ámbito de las personas con autismo. Esta puede ser la razón por la que la moneda meme XRP ha atraído tanta atención últimamente.
HarryPotterObamaPacMan8Inu también tiene un mecanismo de staking donde los titulares pueden acceder a NFT de edición limitada y otras funciones exclusivas. Aunque ninguna de estas se ha lanzado todavía, la plataforma ha sido tendencia durante semanas, aumentando el valor de la moneda meme XRP en más del 144%.
La plataforma todavía tiene un largo camino por recorrer, pero el desempeño reciente sugiere su potencial para rivalizar con las principales monedas meme.
Conclusiones HarryPotterObamaPacMan8Inu y NuggetRush han estado llamando la atención durante un tiempo. Ambos tokens han disfrutado de un alto compromiso que les ha valido un fuerte respaldo, lo que ha llevado a múltiples hitos.
Mientras el mercado se prepara para despegar, hay quienes recomiendan mirar con atención ciertos proyectos dentro de las monedas meme. Las ofertas bien estructuradas de HarryPotterObamaPacMan8Inu lo posicionan como un fuerte contendiente, mientras que el impresionante desempeño de preventa de NuggetRush y su colección de NFTs para invertir ofrecen alternativas a los potenciales usuarios.
Los interesados pueden conocer más sobre el proyecto a continuación:
Visita la web de NuggetRush Descargo de responsabilidad: Esta es una nota patrocinada producida por el equipo de NuggetRush, por lo que DiarioBitcoin NO respalda ni promueve las ofertas, productos o servicios comerciales citados a lo largo del texto.La comercialización de criptomonedas en fase de preventa puede ser una actividad riesgosa, más aún si estas no se realiza a través de un launchpad o plataforma conocida. Recomendamos a los interesados investigar más sobre el proyecto y su propuesta de valor antes de invertir su capital, ya que toda inversión conlleva riesgos importantes. Texto de NuggetRush
Imagen de NuggetRush
